nodes.text: Star Wars - Die Rückkehr Der Jedi-Ritter is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It contains dramatized passages from the film script performed by a cast in German translation along with narration by Joachim Kerzel. The CD was released by the German label WortArt in 2004 as part of a series of six single-disc audio adaptations of the original and prequel trilogies.

The adaptations of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back in this series used the German translation "Krieg der Sterne" for "Star Wars" on the product cover. Beginning with this adaptation, the series used the English-language "Star Wars" name alongside the German translation of the subtitle.
